subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Tone mod-1
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1203710934
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hi Frank,
 
You being honest is all that any of us want from you.  And that is why  you 
get so much respect.
 
Jeff
 
In a message dated 2/22/2008 1:59:49 P.M. Central Standard Time,  
purplealiengirl@... writes:

 
 
 
Hard to hear in the cell phone video, but just had time to do a  quickie demo 
before having to run to work. Thought I might as well keep  posting the 
information so it can be ripped off by the ones selling their  stufff, and they can 
say how flawed my stuff is. I really don't mind others  taking the ideas and 
making improvements, changes, and making a profit, but ya  don't have to beat 
me up in the process.  See the current TAPs paramag  for the curious. I heard 
about it through someone that gets the mag, but  don't know anything first 
hand. I don't care that much to spend money to get  magazine. 
Paranormal=HollywooI heard

I am well aware  of the short comings of my equipment, I'm just honest enough 
not to sell it  till it's perfected. I'm not an engineer, just a hillbilly 
techno  droid trying satisfy her own curiousity.  

Frank-S

 
____________________________________

give. _Learn more._ 
(http://im.live.com/Messenger/IM/Home/?source=text_hotmail_join)
